title: Privy Purses (Charged Expenditure) Act, 1968
description: Official consolidated text of Privy Purses (Charged Expenditure) Act, 1968 (IX of 1968) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title
provisions.content: This Act may be called the Privy Purses (Charged Expenditure) Act,

provisions.title: Section 1968. 2. Expenditure on privy purse to be charged expenditure
provisions.content:
Where, under any
agreement for the time being in force between the 1[Federal Government] and the Ruler of a
former State which at any time was in accession with Pakistan or his successor, any sum is
payable as privy purse by the 1[Federal Government], such sum shall be charged on the
1
[Federal Consolidated Fund] and be paid out of that Fund and shall be deemed always to have
been so charged and paid.
Date:- 21.03.2024
1
Subs. by the F.A.O., 1975 (P.O.4)., Art. 2 and Table.
